casebody.data:
IN RE: Foreclosure of ADAMS 78P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 14, 2017 Jonathan B. Davis, Attorney at Law, Snow Hill, for Bank of New York. Tamara R. Cornish, Attorney at Law, for Cornish Law, PLLC (Substitute Trustee). Erin Rozzelle, Attorney at Law, for Adams, Bruce J.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of March 2017 by Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2017."
